Title: The Bhaskaran stamp is easily recognised by connoisseurs
Content: A stark black and white painting of the Kathiawadi couple on a flame red background positioned on one end of the gallery on a raised platform lords over all the other canvases on show at R.B. Bhask
Author: V. V. Ramani
Description: A stark black and white painting of the Kathiawadi couple on a flame red background positioned on one end of the gallery on a raised platform lords over all the other canvases on show at R.B. Bhask
